title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy does not appear. I don't understand why it's not working.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy does not appear when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should appear when hitting F4 on a binary project selection.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select a file within the project. 3. Press the F4 key.
